meanings.definition: To spread news or rumors widely.
meanings.sent1: She bruited the news of her engagement to all her friends.
meanings.sent2: The gossip about the new teacher was bruited throughout the school.
meanings.sent3: The rumor bruited about the missing homework turned out to be false.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the air bruited the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter bruited from the party next door.
